QuestData.Title: The Final Power
QuestData.Description: I never thought it would come to this!$B$BLeven went to face Warlord Zhao-Jin the Bloodletter at the top of the palace steps, but our reinforcements cannot get through!$B$BWe are the only ones who stand between him and the Vale's greatest... and most deadly... powers.$B$BPlease, $n, you must find a way to stop him!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The leader of the Shao-Tien mogu.
